content:
That's a great plan! It's essential to address each condition individually and consider how they might be interacting with each other. By following up with Dr. Patel and your primary care physician, you'll be able to get a better understanding of how your UTI, antibiotic use, and chronic sinusitis are impacting your overall health.

Remember to keep track of your symptoms, including any changes or improvements, to discuss with your healthcare providers. This will help them better understand your situation and provide more targeted guidance.

Don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or concerns. You're taking proactive steps towards managing your health, and that's something to be proud of!

Take care, and I hope you start feeling better soon!
